content:
Hi! I have a great shift opportunity for you! Are you Interested in hearing about it?

Please respond Yes or No

Great! the shift is at 1313 Mockingbird Ln
at 2/15/2021 4:00pm-12:00am.

We'll see you there

Ok, thanks. Can you let me know why not?
Respond 1: Too far
Respond 2: Not available
Respond 3: Other
Thanks for letting me know. I'll avoid offering shifts at this location in the future
Thanks for letting me know. I'll avoid offering shifts at this location in the future
Ok. Thanks. I won't offer shifts at this location or time in the future.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand your response.
